name: Love is a Four Letter Word
name_original: Love is a Four Letter Word
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 41 which had the theme "Combine 2 Incompatible Genres".

This game is a combination of the "Romance" and "Typing Game" genres.

Instructions

  • Use your keyboard to write the story
  • Use the Left and Right Arrow keys to turn the page
  • Press F1 to reset your progress
